text:
The photos don't do the place justice, its enormous! The location was spot on for my group as we were roughly 10 mins walk to the main town and old town. The kitchen had coffee, air conditioning worked throughout, all showers were hot and great, kitchen has full facilities, and the windows have electric black out shutters that come down at the touch of a button.
One thing I will say is that the "4th room" is not really a 4th room. It worked for us as we didnâ€™t use it but there are 3 very clear distinct bedrooms that are amazing, all have ensuite. The 4th room is a small office with a fold out bed and very little room, the door to the room is also clear glass, so no privacy. If you had a small child or a cot with a baby, then I would say that this is perfect for it but for a grown adult or couple it would be a huge contrast to the other rooms, and you may well be disappointed.
It did not detract from a great stay, A+ for Arpad on comms, fast and efficient when needed which was rare

text:
Although this was not the original place we booked, Arpad was very quick to notify us and present to us this new place which was perfect.
This was a great apartment with a lot of space and antique settings. All 3 bedrooms had its own shower/toilet facilities which was perfect for us. There was some building work going on outside so it was a little noisy in the mornings, however the soundproof blinds helped alot with this ğŸ‘Œ. There is also not much of views to be seen through the windows, however it is a short drive from the main shopping areas and old town so was not a big issue for us.
Arpad himself was an amazing and friendly host. He was always there to help and responsive everytime we raised a question. He also allowed us extra time to checkout which was very good for us as we had a late departure.
Overall, i would highly reccomend this apartment to anyone planning to visit, especially if it is a group of around 4-6 people as it has all the bedrooms and living space you need.

text:
A beautiful apartment close to the historical centre of Bucharest, but with privacy and quiet. Looks as expected from the pictures although they don't do full credit to its size - the place has a huge living and dining area and large bedrooms. I had the fortune to use the master suite which was almost as big as my flat back home!
Well supplied, comfortable, and highly recommended.

The apartment is highly recommended if you have 4 or more in your party and Arpad is a wonderful host. Highly recommended and I would rent it again.
